sys_hub_flow.description:
Creates a new DNS record in the specified zone, for the specified domain, of the given record type. Currently supported record types are: A , AAAA

Inputs:

  • Zone - Zone name (e.g. mycompany.com).
  • Domain- Domain name (e.g. mydomain.mycompany.com).
  • Type - Record type (e.g. A)
  • IP Address - IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format (e.g. 12.12.3.4)
  • Create a reverse zone and record - Create a reverse zone and record (e.g. False)

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to Success if the request succeeds or Error if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • Zone Name- Zone name (e.g. mycompany.com).
  • Domain Name- Domain name (e.g. mydomain.mycompany.com).
  • Type - Record type (e.g. A)
  • IP Address - IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format (e.g. 12.12.3.4)
  • Reverse Zone - Reverse Zone
  • Reverse Record - Reverse Record
  • Message - Message from subflow

Creates a new DNS record in the specified zone, for the specified domain, of the given record type. Currently supported record types are: A , AAAA

Inputs:

  • Zone - Zone name (e.g. mycompany.com).
  • Domain- Domain name (e.g. mydomain.mycompany.com).
  • Type - Record type (e.g. A)
  • IP Address - IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format (e.g. 12.12.3.4)
  • Create a reverse zone and record - Create a reverse zone and record (e.g. False)

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to Success if the request succeeds or Error if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • Zone Name- Zone name (e.g. mycompany.com).
  • Domain Name- Domain name (e.g. mydomain.mycompany.com).
  • Type - Record type (e.g. A)
  • IP Address - IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format (e.g. 12.12.3.4)
  • Reverse Zone - Reverse Zone
  • Reverse Record - Reverse Record
  • Message - Message from subflow
